channel.title: CVE Feed for rpcbind -- rpcbind
channel.description: The latest CVEs for rpcbind -- rpcbind

item.title: CVE-2010-2064|2024-08-07T02:17:14.479Z -- rpcbind -- rpcbind
item.description: rpcbind 0.2.0 allows local users to write to arbitrary files or gain privileges via a symlink attack on (1) /tmp/portmap.xdr and (2) /tmp/rpcbind.xdr.

item.title: CVE-2010-2061|2024-08-07T02:17:13.585Z -- rpcbind -- rpcbind
item.description: rpcbind 0.2.0 does not properly validate (1) /tmp/portmap.xdr and (2) /tmp/rpcbind.xdr, which can be created by an attacker before the daemon is started.
